title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1205.2 - Tunnels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1205.2 - Tunnels

State Regulations
(a) Vehicles giving
off offensive or obnoxious odors. (b) Vehicles emitting an excessive amount of
smoke. (c) Buses in which the number
of persons standing or not occupying fixed seats exceeds 22 or one-half of the
total seating capacity, whichever is less. (d) Vehicles having a tire width of less than
three inches. (e) Animals, except
when properly confined in vehicles. (f) Vehicles not capable of maintaining
minimum speed (see speed limits, section
1202.1
). (g) Vehicles using compressed flammable
gases; e.g., propane, butane, blaugas, liquefied petroleum gas, acetylene, as
fuel for engines, heaters or refrigeration elements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1205.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
